overview: Gemini 3 Flash, ideal for tasks where speed is crucial, is now rolling out in public preview in GitHub Copilot.

detailed_explanation.title: Overview
bullets: Gemini 3 Flash, ideal for tasks where speed is crucial, is now rolling out in public preview in GitHub Copilot.

detailed_explanation.title: Availability in GitHub Copilot
bullets: Gemini 3 Flash is now rolling out in Copilot Pro, Pro+, Business, and Enterprise.
You’ll be able to select the model in the Copilot model picker from:
Visual Studio Code in all modes: chat, ask, edit, agent
Rollout will be gradual. If you don’t see the new model yet, check back soon.

detailed_explanation.title: Enabling access
bullets: Enterprise and Business plans : Administrators must enable Gemini 3 Flash in Copilot settings. Once enabled, users in that organization will see the model in the Copilot model picker.
Pro and Pro+ plans : Users can enable the model by selecting it in the model picker and confirming the one-time prompt.
Bring your own key : Within Visual Studio Code, select Manage Models from the picker, choose Gemini 3 Flash, and enter your API key when prompted.

detailed_explanation.title: Learn more
bullets: To explore all models available in GitHub Copilot, see our documentation on models and get started with Copilot.

detailed_explanation.title: Share your feedback
bullets: Join the GitHub Community to share your feedback.
